channel.title: LeetCode on XiaoTuanZiJiang

item.title: LeetCode
item.description: LeetCode_每日一题 3.22-2038. 如果相邻两个颜色均相同则删除当前颜色 难度：中等 脑筋急转弯 class Solution { public boolean winnerOfGame(String colors) { char[] cs = colors.toCharArray(); int n = cs.length; int Acnt = 0, Bcnt = 0; for (int i = 1; i < n - 1; i++) { if (cs[i] == 'A' && cs[i - 1] == 'A' && cs[i + 1] == 'A') Acnt++; if (cs[i] == 'B' && cs[i - 1] == 'B' && cs[i + 1] == 'B') Bcnt++; } return Acnt > Bcnt; } } 3.
